overview: Gabriel, 38, single, works for one of the largest groups in the CAC 40. Subject to constant pressure, he escapes by satisfying his fantasies and in particular his fetish for lingerie. The excitement he feels at the sight of beautiful women in sexy underwear is indescribable and the desire that invades him becomes uncontrollable. Gabriel the ideal son-in-law gives way to Gabriel the sexually obsessed.
title: Diary of a Fetishist
